_header: Why hast thou me forsake that made thee of nought
_description: Christ’s lament on the Cross — three lines

WorcF126.Transcription:
Wy hastou me forsake þat mad þe of noghtWhy hastou me
                    forsake þat þe so dere boughtWy hastou me forsake þat for
                    þe to deye…[was brought]
